text: Abandu boosi bali be idini ndala, (yayetsa ninayo Adam) (Mana nibakabukhana) mana Nyasaye narera Abarumwa abareranga amacheni amalayi nende okhwikanyilisia, mana- nabeshilia halala ninabo ebitabu khubwatoto bikabule Abandu akabawukhanamwo, Ne shibawukhana khwako halali abahebwa ebitabu ebo- abwatoto nibwakhamala okhubetsela shichila ishinda hakari wabu, mana Nyasaye nalunjisia balia basuubila khukalia akabawukhanamwo khubunyali bubwe, Ne Nyasaye alunjisinjia wayenya khunjila ingolololofu
